author: Anonymous Beaker
title: edX HtDD-Itemization Q5
question: I'm a little confused why we don't need to check if r is between 1 and 100, because if the constraint is written in as a comment so how does DrRacket know what the restrictions are.
student_answer: I believe this question was answered in lecture, where it was said that since a constraint is there anyway we'd expect whoever's running the code to follow at least that.
